resource.title: Wan HuMo SVI Pro v5 Workflow
resource.description: Advanced workflow combining Wan2.2 A14B I2V High Noise with Wan HuMo 14B for high-quality lip-synced video generation with SVI Loras for clean continuations
resource.creator: Ablejones

requirements: WanExperiments from drozbay GitHub for HuMo I2V behavior
Wan2.2 A14B I2V High Noise model
ComfyUI Essentials nodes (nightly version for SimpleMathDual+)
recommended_settings: Higher resolution (1024x1024) improves lip sync significantly vs 512x512
Disable SageAttention if lip sync issues occur
Use --no-cache for very long videos to avoid RAM issues
tips: Prompt aggressively for motion in SVI stages
Remove 'speaking/talking' from prompts - let HuMo add when needed
Try different seeds if lip sync breaks on specific segments
Original image should look directly at camera for best eye tracking
Face size in pixels is crucial for HuMo quality
usage.workflow_notes: READ THE NOTES IN THE WORKFLOW! Sections are designed to be subgraphable but avoid GetNodes in subgraphs

technical_details: Uses SVI 2 Pro lora combined with SVI v2 lora for 2.1
HuMo processes audio by splitting vocals from instruments using melbandroformer
Audio encoder uses same overlap as video but should be padded with silence
VRAM usage increases with frames per generation and resolution, not number of extensions
Each segment runs independently - if first works, all should work
Color drift minimized in v5 through improved anchoring with SVI

issues_and_solutions.issue: SimpleMathDual+ node missing in ComfyUI Essentials
issues_and_solutions.solution: Switch to nightly version of comfyui_essentials in ComfyUI Manager

issues_and_solutions.issue: Static images in extensions with certain SVI models
issues_and_solutions.solution: Use original SVI models, avoid using 2.2 loras on HuMo (2.1 based model)

issues_and_solutions.issue: RAM OOM crashes during long generations
issues_and_solutions.solution: Use --no-cache flag or save/reload videos to continue from checkpoint
Adjust audio delay node, ensure audio length matches frame boundaries exactly
Increase resolution, disable SageAttention, ensure face looks directly at camera

related_resources: OmniAvatar-14B LoRA for potential lip sync improvement
summary: This is a sophisticated workflow combining Wan2.2 and HuMo models with SVI loras to create high-quality lip-synced video extensions. The v5 iteration offers improved motion dynamics and color consistency, with extensive community testing showing successful results up to 40+ seconds with proper settings and prompting.
